A Software To study and learn the content presented in this book, you will be required to download and install a few computer standalone applications. Below, you will learn how to download and install these applications in your machine. A.1 JASP The open-source statistical package JASP[3] will be used to demonstrate the statistical analyses covered in this book. A.1.1 Prerequisites Windows, MacOS, or Linux Basic knowledge of spreadsheet files A.1.2 Download and installation Please, follow the instructions found in (ref) to install JASP in your device.
